prompt: Create a simple Express.js REST API for a todo list with GET /todos, POST /todos, DELETE /todos/:id endpoints. Use in-memory storage (array). Include input validation. Save it to server.js, install dependencies, and run it to verify with curl.
expected_behaviors: Tests with curl or similar to verify endpoints

prompt: Write a Node.js script that fetches data from 3 different API endpoints concurrently using Promise.all: (1) https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1, (2) https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/1, (3) https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/comments?postId=1. Log the combined results. Save to fetch_all.js and run it.
expected_behaviors: Uses Promise.all or equivalent for concurrent requests
Fixes mutation by using spread or slice
Fixes comparison to use a.age - b.age
